sentences.sentence: Joshua 5:3 and Joshua made him sharp knives, and circumcised the children of Israel at the hill of the foreskins.
sentences.translation: 书5：3约书亚就制造了火石刀，在除皮山那里给以色列人行割礼。

sentences.sentence: When they did me, in the early 1960s, most British and north American middle-class males had their foreskins removed at birth.
sentences.translation: 当我做手术时，是20世纪60年代早期。 那是大多数英国和北美的中产阶级男性在出生时就进行割礼。

sentences.sentence: Saul replied, "Say to David, 'the king wants no other price for the bride than a hundred Philistine foreskins, to take revenge on his enemies."'
sentences.translation: 扫罗说：“你们要对大卫这样说：‘王不要什么聘礼，只要一百非利士人的阳皮，好在王的仇敌身上报仇。’”
